institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-Specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) Operating Rules/Article 7 (Review Committee and Evaluation Committee)
contents: Article 7 (Review Committee and Evaluation Committee) ① The Corporation may form and operate a review committee or evaluation committee to support the deliberation and resolution of the review committee for each item of Article 6 (1). ② The Corporation appoints experts in the fields of vocational competency development, qualifications, NCS, human resource development, budgeting and accounting, etc. to form a screening committee and evaluation committee and conduct screening and evaluation. Revised on January 2, 2019, ③ The Corporation may separately determine the number of members and qualifications of the review committee and evaluation committee depending on the purpose and scale of the review and evaluation, and the members who participated in the review committee and evaluation committee are provided with the provisions of Appendix 1 「 Allowances and travel expenses may be paid in accordance with the “Standards for Payment of Deliberation Committee Member Allowances, etc.”
